file_insights.description: MACD indicator implementation using EMA components
Updated to include MACD module export

patterns_discovered: EMA-based indicator implementation consistent with previous RSI patterns
Bundled output design with MacdOutput struct
O(n) time complexity for indicator calculations
NaN values for initial lookback periods
gotchas_discovered: First slow_period-1 MACD values are NaN
First slow_period+signal_period-2 signal/histogram values are NaN
recommendations: Follow established patterns from SMA and EMA implementations
Maintain consistent error handling across indicators
Provide both allocating and in-place calculation functions
Document NaN handling for initial periods
Ensure comprehensive test coverage including boundary conditions
